title: Champs/Skins I was gifted are gone!  Where did they go?!
body:
Hey everyone,

Several players have noticed that content they were gifted has been removed from their accounts.  If this content was removed, its not usually due to an error regarding the account.  Typically, this content is removed due to gifts being sent as a result of fraudulent activity.  There are two main ways this occurs:

1)  If a player participates in Refer-A-Friend fraud to acquire IP or RP, then any champions/skins gifted with this IP or RP are removed.

2)  If a player purchases RP and gifts content with it, and subsequently issues a chargeback for the money spent on that RP, we will remove that content.

If you believe that content you have purchased/received on your account has gone missing and is not due to either of these two scenarios, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  We can look into your account and investigate further!

replies.body: So let me get this straight, you give thousands and thousands of Rp, to the tune of over 80000 rp away every day in "tournaments" like victorious gaming, where people smurf in bronze to earn craploads of rp, but your main concern is to punish people who got scammed by a refer a friend bot.... taking away the skins from not only them, but any friend they gifted, and not even giving them the option to pay for those gifts using other RP. I have played league since beta, I didn't receive my king rammus and got a generic response when I asked about it, there is so much shotty stuff going on in your company, but you have the gall to just basically "ninja" a ton of skins away from people because of your inability to monitor the refer a friend program?

It was Riot's fault as well as ours. They didn't monitor the system as you said. And after they just took the skins that weren't even bought with the RAF RP.
 I feel sorry for your King Rammus skin, as well as some of my own legacy skins which I probably won't get anymore. And the limited skins that we gifted to friends and family with RP which was bought through Riot store. 
It's not fair to take these gifts. If you couldn't isolate the stuff bought via RAF system you just **cannot** go around taking skins and gifts purchased the regular way to compensate, like the championship and legacy skins which won't be in the store anymore.
The title of this thread almost makes it sound like a joke that people are missing things they had...

Riot is always talking about "clarity", but when it comes to letting people know that skins have been removed and if that have what ones, they suck.
I have had skins removed but im still waiting on an email to tell me so. Also i just bought Rp 2 days ago for snowdown and they remove my skins for it and im sure they dont intend to refund me it whatsoever. GG riot indeed!
This kind of thing is REALLY annoying for those of us that have more skins than we can keep track of. Why do we not get a notification when something is removed in a case like this?
Definitely a good point.  We're look into making sure notifications are given in the future!
No god damn it you need to email people the ones you removed. Don't try and put something like this off like you guys at riot normally do.

I absolutely agree. I received an email that "We regret to inform you that we have had to remove this content due to a payment issue with the account", but there are skins I don't remember if I owned or not, so if you truly regret it, please at least notify what had disappeared because I can't keep track of all the skins I own.

What about people who traded mystery gifts with those scammers? 

What happens to all of those RP transactions? From what I understood from my experience, **ALL** of the RP, **LEGITIMATE OR FRAUDULENT**, were **NULLED AND VOIDED**. 

So will those, who were victims of this system, be compensated in anyway? Or will Riot turn a blind eye to those who were victims of their own good faith in their so-called friends?
they a turn a blind eye. I speak from experience.
LOL wtf. I traded mystery skins with my friend, now all the skins he gifted me are all gone
Same. Why do i have to suffer because a person whom i met through league  decided to trade gift skins and mine are legit and they decided to fraud riot. Why do i get the shaft? its BS

Unprofessionally handled, no notice at all from a company that's more than capable of giving a heads up. Completely random choice of Runes/Champions and skins removed, sort this out (considering just returning to the game, I'm not convinced that I'll be giving it any time at all). Poor excuse for customer support.

> [{quoted}](name=Sukiru,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=gfX587IW,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2014-12-15T02:00:22.576+0000)
> Unprofessionally handled, no notice at all from a company that's more than capable of giving a heads up. Completely random choice of Runes/Champions and skins removed, sort this out (considering just returning to the game, I'm not convinced that I'll be giving it any time at all). Poor excuse for customer support.

Peace out.
Hey I have recently lost some skins that are legendary that are not available anymore, and i am wondering why I have lost them when i use my money to buy them.
I closed my wallet to Riot. If enough people do, Riot will be forced to make changes to start their money flow again.
this is unreasonable, we should keep the skins and the account that got banned or used the fraud should get banned.

User A gives user B several skins through gifting
User A's credit card has a chargeback
User A is banned
User B keeps skins
Twist: User A and User B were the same user the entire time!

This is a horrible idea that can be horribly abused.

-ChrisB5
{{champion:89}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:101}}

This is gonna get down-voted to hell so there's almost so point but but hear me out.  I only own a few skins so i remember exactly how I got them.  When first reading this, like many others i got very frustrated.  I decided to take a look, fearing i would loose some of the skins I bought or ones that i knew I got from my friends legitimately.  I was ecstatic to find that all my legitimate skins were still there.  I know for a fact that my friends friend was involved in the RAF botting and got a ton of rewards from it.  With this, he gave everyone gift skins (at the time I was not aware how bad it was to do that).  These were the only skins i had taken away, which shows its not "random"  Riot is finding exactly what the player was given illegitimately and taking it away.  I have two MAJOR problems with it.  For one, i only got a generalized message about what happened.  I had no idea what i lost and i realize that for people with a crap ton of skins, it would be a pain in the butt to sort out.  Is it really THAT hard to tell you what the player had removed.  I get that there are a bunch of people that this message goes out to, but lets be honest, this isn't affecting the majority of League players.  The other problem is that this is targeting the people that received the gifts who had not control over the sending.  What you are doing is trying to cut down this "tree" of illegitimate rewards.  Every time another person is brought into it, another "branch" sprouts.  All you are doing is cutting these branches, which will ultimately grow back.  You need to attack the "roots," the people that engage in the botting.  Ban them or take away their skins and champions. They broke the summoner e, they should be punished.  People will often trade mystery gifts because it is a cheaper way to recieve skins.  One person may give a gift payed in legitimate RP while the other's gift is payed illegitimately.  With this "system" the person that actually bought RP from you is getting punished, way to make then want to buy from you again.  All you have to to is take away skins from the person that's actually breaking the code (what an idea).  Now all these people that did the botting are waltzing away with their new skins and to this day they have not been punished.  You've made a new RAF system to stop the botting, GREAT... wait... that just prevents it in the future.  You now do this, take away the gifted skins from people that may have not even known it was illegitimately earned... still not hurting the botters.  You guys need to do something that actually punishes the botters for what they did.  Neither of those two things did that.  Banning them for a week inst gonna do anything.  Make them unable to receive gifts and take away their illegitimately earned skins.  Make them unable to earn IP until they have made up the amount they earned from the botting.  Its really not rocket science, just set your minds to it and do it.  All THIS is accomplishing is making players that actually buy your RP close their wallets to you.

It's bad enough you take 30 of my skins away with no warning but now you even take my rp and all the ip i saved up? I spent my hard earn cash on rp just for you to take it back away, i cant even buy skins anymore because the next day they are gone even though i bought rp with my money, and all this because scammers exploited a program that never worked. I didnt have a problem with the actions they took at first but now i am losing a lot more then what i gained. 

They need to change the description to "Several players have noticed that content they were gifted has been removed from their accounts along side with their Ip earned and Rp bought, Players are also unable to buy the skins that were taken away from them and are subjected to immediate confiscation if they attempt to buy it again.

TL;DR: Riot does not care about doing what is right, only what profits them money. I urge all of you to stop supporting such a worthless company.

I bought a champion ONLY because I was going to be gifted a skin. Well the guy who gifted me it did something bad so the skin got removed. They wouldnt refund me the champion... I have an email chain from all the wonderful non supportive employees at riot, explaining how it was impossible for them to do the right thing and issue me a refund. Apparently they would rather screw me out of a 900+RP champ and never get anymore money, then help and support a better future for themselves. I tell you what, I know the Dota 2, and Smite customer service is way better, and they are Free to Play, I have made the switch already, I hope Riot starts losing money and fixes a lot of wrongs they have done.

Riot have not even disclosed which skins they have removed from my/your accounts either and so it is difficult to work out whether they have in fact removed content from the accounts which equals the content which was 'fraudulently' gained and so they may have in fact taken more RP from my account which they are unable to prove they didn't, and so this is actually illegal as they could have removed RP purchases made from their online store which I paid for and so they are in fact stealing from me and cannot prove otherwise.

Would appreciate a reply from riot for this and so upvote please

> 1)  If a player participates in Refer-A-Friend fraud to acquire IP or RP, then*** any champions/skins gifted with this IP or RP are removed***.


I have looked in the past and looked again after reading this.. How does one gift a skin/champion with IP? or was this an oversight when making this post?

So technically you're saying I just lost 20 euros of RP, because I did some Gift4Gifts with someone with ''Fraud RP'' that I didn't know of? So he can keep his skins I payed with REAL money, as a GOOD person. And I lost my skins and MONEY because someone gifted them with fraud RP. 

Total bullcrap.
GGWP riot you guys just ruining a great online game

We put a system in place for you to abuse

When we needed more money for LCS 

    We took it all away and said TOUGH LUCK

TYRANNICAL DICTATORSHIP

I am really disappointed in Riot. A while ago Riot made a mistake booking from my Credit card and they punished me for it even though i could proof that the mistake was definitely not my fault. They disabled the option to pay via giropay for me, which comnpletely sucks since i don't have a lot of options. Now i get punished for something that i had nothing to do with AGAIN. 

Not only a horrible community but even the worst costumer service. Not even EA can compare. That is a high horse you're sitting on.

Man I'm reading about this stuff from soo many people... Of course we, like Riot, were bad I think... But the way they want to resolve this problem is just hilarious ...

Me and my friend have decided to stop playing lol for a while (there are soo many other games)... I guess riot managers would change their mind if all the players that received this treatment would follow our point of view...

The fact is that they just presume we are addicted to lol so they can behave as they want not caring about any boycott by players... And I'm worry they are true...

LET'S WAKE UP AND SHOW TO RIOT A RIOT MAN!!!

Yesterday i was quite disappointed when I logged to play LoL and realised some of my skins were gone. I have been supporting this game for 4 years, me and my boyfriend purchased more than 100 skins during that time. The skins that got deleted were gifted to me by my friends for Xmas. I dont know how they got their rp was it fraud or not but even if it was I dont think it is fair you should be punishing innocent people who havent done anything. You can take away skins/champs/etc and rp from fraud from the people who did it but deleting skins from everyone else is pure greediness. Riot , I have been always defending LoL from friends who quitted and bullsh1tted it but I think they might be right. Only think you care about is making profits. There are many other mobas like Smite for example where every month there is Gem events ( equal to RP ). My friends that play it for 2 years got 40 skins for free and here you just rob us and make new skins but never gift RP or make events for us to acquire it.

Another thing is , even if people did fraud by RAF system and got RP you lose nothing. Yes , its true you dont profit from that RP but you do not lose anything because most likely people who did fraud would never purchase your RP anyways.

It is highly likely all comments here will be ignored but if you do read them you should really reflect on what greedy bastards you have become! I am quite disappointed.

I am really loving riot. Before this, I got an extensive chat ban because a group of trolls all reported me at once, but the real toxic community is still running rampant. Then I go to play my main Darius, and notice that my dunkmaster is gone. So when I went to buy it again with the 2800 rp I just bought from riot, I realized that I only had 1028. So I looked for anything else and noticed that Ziggs and my Full Metal Jayce are missing. I must have been gifted by people who bought referrals, but I traded a total of 3000 rp for those and now have none of it. Wasting my money. So why did I just get two skins and a champ (and hopefully nothing more) taken away from me along with almost 2000 rp and all I had to do was spend enough money for 6000 rp! What a deal! At least I know what thing in my life will have nothing to do with my Christmas, or ever again. I'm not going to support scammers. And please, rito; rage. Rage on. Ban my account to show your power because you obviously don't care about the community if you are taking our money although we stayed loyal to you. Disrespectful.
What kind of policy is this? That was a wrong move Riot, way to go becoming assholes, like EA games.

Sooo..

I counted 7 missing skins,  not sure if there's more which I cannot recall right now.
First off: Why remove the gifting history along with the skins (or maybe it was removed before, I didn't check for a while)? I'd like to have a look into who I "traded" mystery gifts with so I can a) not exchange gifts again with that person  b) talk to that person and maybe figure something out  (since I should  know the person for a while as I cannot exchange gifts otherwise).

Also you should really state which skins were removed so people don't have to go through 100+ champs to figure out which they are missing (and maybe not noticing some..).

And lastly: Why can you not investigate if there were gifts exchanged between people (and not just gifted from one side) and then remove the skins the party who ref-botted or w/e received instead of the ones they gifted to others who actually paid money to gift skins?

I have lost actual money through this while the other party didn't necessarily lose anything through this now? This is kind of weird to me.


/e: in my case only gifted skins were removed. I was a fan of mystery gifts just for the thrill of it and therefore traded gifts with friends. I always bought the RP for gifting which is why I'm pretty sad about  getting ~30+€ taken away from me...

Srsly riot i paid 20 euro to get the gifts that i gave to my friends removed !!?
What about my rp then ? i won't get it even i paid !? 
im not buying anymore .. this is the last time if i don't get my rp back ..

If a known 4chan pedo and REDDIT idiot doesnt like you, or thinks you had too much IP thy've been taking it away.

They set up a system to be abused to increase their numbers for statistics.
Realized people where making money off their bone headed decision.
Decided to punish anyone who  THEY DEEMED to have abused the system.

No proof, and when you demand it you get a COPY PASTED F$%^ OFF letter.

Typical Riot Staff

Hello dArtagnan! While we are talking about the Refer-A-Friend's frauds, can we get an ETA on the new Refer-A-Friend program? 
The players could stop their frauds but they can't, because [the new Refer-A-Friend announced 60 Days ago is still not here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/bBhH9501-upcoming-changes-to-refer-a-friend?show=flat&page=58). Its also the reason why we can still see bots vs bots in any game any lvl. So any ETA on the release please ?, thanks :)

If you're going to take the skins I gifted people away, and take the skins people have gifted me, I expect a full fucking refund, this is fucking ridiculous! I've spent enough money on them, and I expect it back!

you know what, you riot should just agree that we abused the RAF system because u made a mistake of your own. when people knew they could get free RP from this you should not have done this to us, we abused it yes. but it is a mistake of YOU and not us. and what i now noticed, is also at my account u deleted much more than we got from the RAF IP and RP also skin champs that we or (i at least) bought before it are also gone, including my main ranked champions. that is more than enough reasons for me to quit this pathetic game. you clearly only care about money. not your players.

Hello again guys!

I just got reply from the support team and all they told me was to go fuck myself:)

I would think about notifying the person who is losing the skin exactly what they are losing. If you'r like me then you have way more skins than you can keep track of. So it would be nice to know exactly what im losing.

> [{quoted}](name=Galleleyus,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=gfX587IW,comment-id=005d,timestamp=2014-12-19T17:53:33.664+0000)
>
> I would think about notifying the person who is losing the skin exactly what they are losing. If you'r like me then you have way more skins than you can keep track of. So it would be nice to know exactly what im losing.

That would require

ACCOUNTABILITY
HONESTY
INTEGRITY

Find me a RIOT staff member who actually displays these traits.  They are too busy on REDDIT looking up CP to come up with logical solutions to the same problems THOUSANDS of people are having.

I just wanted to reiterate this...

We put a system in place for you to abuse

When we needed more money for LCS

We took it all away and said TOUGH LUCK

TYRANNICAL DICTATORSHIP

I only ever referred two of my friends so this doesn't affect me but it's still the dumbest thing I've seen riot do in a LONG time. All these dev blogs about clarity and they are going to randomly take shit from people without telling them what was removed? So hypocritical it's not even funny.

Riot knew about the RAF system being abused for over 2 years now, and decide to take action just recent  by taking away all RP from the buyers while the frauds are left with all our money even though it is partially your fault for letting the RAF system being exploited. Nice logic Rito worthless company need to learn about ethics instead only care about how much $$$ they can make.

I completely agree, I lost about 15-20 champions, and ALOT OF skins that werent even involved in this scam. I have spent well over 200 dollars on this stupid game and this just really sent me over edge now. As it looks they just removed the most recent purchases and didnt even try to track down what was really part of the scam. So basically they just swallowed about 80 dollars I just spent.


*****In my opinion I think everyone should consider spending your time and money into a different game/company, one that is LESS SHADY. 
One you can actually trust your money with. Thats what I am doing. *****

I don't understand!! Some of the skins I've had were gifted from a friend as a mystery skin and I doubt their money/RP was fraudulent. To top it all off, I got the skins wayyyyyy before AND I used my OWN HARD EARNED MONEY to gift them as well. So it is almost like you folks are taking back the money we spent, without giving us any compensation. Why are they being removed now??
Not only the champions i buy with rp from refer-a-friend, the champions and skins i buy with the rp i purchases are gone too!! Can anyone explain this? So is my runes!
I trade  skins with my friend and now I lose all skins nice .....
I want my skins back...
Is there any way to know exactly what content was removed?
THIS IS NOT LEGIT!
